name: Alone in the Dark (2008)
description:
Alone in the Dark (2008) is an action game developed by Eden Games. It came out on 20-06-2008. It was published by Atari. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Alone in the Dark (2008) is available on PC.
Nour Polloni produced the game. It was directed by David Nadal. Olivier Deriviere scored the game.
